heading: global credit card network fails
subheading: discover card's authorization network failed for nearly three hours wednesday, knocking out retail sales for bravo card as well.
author: wired news report
text: discover/novus card transactions were halted completely wednesday, possibly because of a satellite outage in the company's authorization network. after going down around 11:30 a.m. pst, the network ceased to function for more than three hours.the outage was limited to novus' family of cards, which include bravo, discover, and a number of "private issue" cards.novus officials were unavailable to comment on why the system was down, or what had caused the outage.merchants calling the company's help line were told that the outage was affecting all major credit cards, but representatives from american express, visa and mastercard were all unaware of any outage on their systems.
